Function Documentation

int System (  std::string  cmd  ) 
 

my_system from man system this same like system(const char *), but better ;-)

Returns:
-1: perror("fork()"); 0: if
Parameters:
cmd == NULL; status getting from waitpid 

00034 {
00035   pid_t pid, status;
00036   
00037   if ( cmd != "" ) {
00038     
00039     switch( pid = fork() ) {
00040     case -1: 
00041       TRACE("fork");
00042       return -1;
00043       break;
00044     case 0:
00045       char *argv[4];
00046       argv[0] = "sh";
00047       argv[1] = "-c";
00048       argv[2] = (char *)cmd.c_str();
00049       argv[3] = NULL;
00050       execve("/bin/sh", argv, environ);
00051       exit(127);
00052       break;
00053       
00054     default:
00055       do {
00056     if (waitpid(pid, &status, 0) == -1) {
00057       if (errno != EINTR) {
00058         TRACE("return -1");
00059         return -1;
00060       }
00061     } else {
00062       TRACE("return " << status);
00063       return status;
00064     }
00065       } while(1);
00066     }
00067     
00068   }
00069   TRACE("return 0");
00070   return 0;
00071 }
